name: Ubuntu font on Facebook, userstyles, google etc
description:
Add ubuntu font to facebook, userstyles.org and google(including gmail, google docs, etc) by default. You need ubuntu font, which you can get it here-> http://font.ubuntu.com/

*FIX 1* Added ubuntu font to facebook chat
*FIX 2* Added sites userstyles.org and google
*FIX 3* Fixed font on buttons, text-areas and input boxes on gmail
*FIX 4* Little fix on google docs
*FIX 5* Little fix on google's login page and on google docs, google docs are now fully supported with ubuntu font
*FIX 6* Added site goo.gl
*FIX 7* Added site youtube.com
*FIX 8* Added site wikipedia.org
*FIX 9* Added site omgubuntu.co.uk and webupd8.org
*FIX 10* UbuntuBeta font supported now
*FIX 11* All local google domains are now supported(from google.ad to google.co.zw)
